title: Team recruit.
body:
Hey guys, looking for players to create a semi-hardcore team, that will practice together, enter tournaments and so on

Looking for higher elo players

leave a comment with your ign. rank, champ pool. 

No flamers or dishearted people who can't handle a loss. 

cheers.

replies.body:
Hey
Diamond 3 top main ign luckyslamdunk looking for a team to play with

Hi, currently gold and the last few seasons, any lane any champ happy with but used to main adc/mid
ign is Lil Puss

If you have an open slot for a plat 4 jgler id be happy to join
CrimsonHorde189 and my champ pool is evelynn, nocturne, xin zhao, camille, zac, rammus but i can flex more jglers aswell

I'm down. I play support but can also top and mid. I'm silver 1 but I'll hopefully be gold 5 soon
P.S. I'm gold 5 now

Hey Man, im keen to play, i much prefer playing in a team as opposed to soloq

my ign is Pandadude123, Silver IV, i mainly play top but im trying to get better at support

"looking for higher elo players"

"pref high gold"

xd
